UpdateRow: UPDATE dimpaymentmethod pm SET pm.PaymentMethodName = ?, pm.IsActive = ?, pm.LastUpdatedDate = NOW() WHERE pm.PaymentMethodKey = ?
InsertRow: INSERT INTO dimpaymentmethod (PaymentMethodKey, PaymentMethodName, IsActive, LastUpdatedDate) VALUES (?, ?, ?, NOW())
GetNewRowWithKey: SELECT pm.PaymentMethodKey, pm.PaymentMethodName, pm.IsActive, pm.LastUpdatedDate FROM dimpaymentmethod pm WHERE pm.PaymentMethodKey = ?
